Key Match Events: Fernando Tatis Jr. hit a home run in Game 2 of the 2024 NLDS
Jurickson Profar robbed Mookie Betts of a home run
Manny Machado and Jack Flaherty exchanged words
Pre-Game Insights: The series was a best-of-five with the winner advancing to the NLCS
Mookie Betts expressed anticipation for the series to go to five games
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Padres-Dodgers rivalry was highlighted by numerous memorable moments over the years
The series was intense with multiple interactions between players and fans
Others: Player interactions and off-field incidents contributed to the rivalry's intensity
